name: Dealr.fun
description: Dealr: Your AI Agent. Simplifying Onchain Actions for Solana Users. Imagine a world where you don’t need to know how to use a DEX, scan token flows, or memorize contract addresses to make a transaction. All you need to do is say what you want—Dealr takes care of the rest. Solana offers unmatched speed and low fees, but for everyday users, navigating its ecosystem can still feel overwhelming. Analyzing tokens, tracking transfers, executing swaps at the right time, or following whale wallets—all require the right tools and technical know-how.
